code: import React from'react';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Box,Typography}from'@mui/material';import Videos from'./Videos';import{FetchFromApi}from'../utils/FetchFromApi';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Feed=()=>{const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);const{searchTerm}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{FetchFromApi("search?q=".concat(searchTerm)).then(data=>setVideos(data.items));},[searchTerm]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{p:2,sx:{overflowY:"auto",height:"90vh",flex:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h4",fontWeight:"bold",mb:2,sx:{color:"white"},children:["Search Results for: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#f31503"},children:searchTerm})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Videos,{videos:videos})]});};export default Feed;
